products.name: Granular Activated Carbon
products.description: Premium Coconut Shell Based Granular Activated Carbon for superior water & air purification with high adsorption capacity and long-lasting performance.
products.detailedDescription: Our Granular Activated Carbon is a premium-grade filtration media widely used in water treatment, air purification, and industrial applications. Manufactured from high-quality coconut shells, this activated carbon offers exceptional adsorption capacity and high surface area. Key Benefits: 100% Natural & Sustainable, High Adsorption Capacity for chlorine, VOCs, taste, and odor, Superior Hardness & Low Dust. We provide high-quality coconut shell GAC at competitive prices, ensuring consistent performance and bulk availability.
tags: Granular Activated Carbon Suppliers near me

products.name: Silica Sand
products.description: High-purity Silica Sand for water treatment, construction, glass manufacturing, and industrial applications – durable, reliable, and eco-friendly.
products.detailedDescription: Our Silica Sand is a high-grade, naturally occurring mineral widely used in water treatment, glass manufacturing, and construction. With its high silica content, consistent grain size, and excellent chemical purity, it is one of the most reliable filtration media available.

products.name: Pebbles
products.description: Natural Pebbles Media for water treatment, filtration plants, landscaping, and construction – durable, eco-friendly, and long-lasting performance.
products.detailedDescription: Our Pebbles Media is a natural, hard, and durable material widely used in water treatment plants as a support layer for other filter media. Carefully graded and screened, these pebbles provide excellent support for sand and anthracite, ensuring maximum efficiency.

products.name: Gravel Media
products.description: High-quality Gravel Media for water filtration, wastewater treatment, and construction applications – durable, natural, and long-lasting support media.
products.detailedDescription: Our Gravel Media is a naturally hard and durable material used as a support media in water filtration systems. With consistent grain size and high strength, gravel ensures efficient water flow and improved filtration.

products.name: Anthracite Media
products.description: High-grade Anthracite Filter Media for water treatment, wastewater purification, and industrial filtration – durable, efficient, and long-lasting.
products.detailedDescription: Our Anthracite Filter Media is a high-carbon, durable filtration material used in multimedia filters. With its angular shape and high hardness, anthracite provides excellent turbidity removal and longer filter runs compared to sand alone.

products.name: Powder Activated Carbon
products.description: High-quality Powder Activated Carbon for water purification, wastewater treatment, and industrial applications – fine, efficient, and fast-acting.
products.detailedDescription: Our Powder Activated Carbon (PAC) is a fine, high-purity adsorbent made from materials such as coconut shells and coal. Known for its large surface area and quick action, PAC is widely used in drinking water purification and wastewater treatment.
tags: Activated Carbon Powder for liquid Purification

products.name: Manganese Dioxide (MnO₂)
products.description: High-purity Manganese Dioxide (MnO₂) filter media for efficient removal of iron, manganese, and hydrogen sulfide from water – durable and long-lasting.
products.detailedDescription: Our Manganese Dioxide (MnO₂) filter media is a specially processed mineral for water treatment. Known for its strong oxidizing properties, MnO₂ efficiently removes iron, manganese, and hydrogen sulfide from groundwater.

products.name: Water Softener Plant(1200 Ltr Resin Cap)
products.description: High-performance Water Softener Plant designed to remove hardness from water, ensuring scale-free plumbing, efficient appliances, and pure water.
products.detailedDescription: A Water Softener Plant is an advanced water treatment system designed to remove hardness-causing minerals like calcium and magnesium from water using ion exchange technology. Hard water creates scaling in pipelines, boilers, and appliances, reducing efficiency. Our Water Softener Plant ensures 100% soft water, protection against scaling, and longer life of pipelines and appliances.
tags: Water Softener Plant manufacturers in Delhi
Water Softener Plant supplier in Delhi

products.name: DM Plant (Demineralization)
products.description: High-efficiency DM Plant to remove dissolved salts and minerals, delivering 100% pure demineralized water for industrial and laboratory applications.
products.detailedDescription: A Demineralization (DM) Plant removes dissolved salts and minerals through cation and anion exchange resin technology. It produces high-purity demineralized water ideal for industrial, pharmaceutical, and laboratory use. Our DM Plant features advanced ion-exchange resins for complete demineralization, delivering water with very low conductivity.

products.name: RO Plant (Reverse Osmosis)
products.description: High-performance Reverse Osmosis (RO) Plant for pure, safe, and crystal-clear water by removing TDS, chemicals, salts, and impurities.
products.detailedDescription: A Reverse Osmosis (RO) Plant is an advanced water purification system that removes dissolved salts, heavy metals, bacteria, and viruses through a semi-permeable membrane. It ensures safe, healthy, and great-tasting water for industrial, commercial, and domestic applications. Our RO Plant features advanced membrane technology with a high salt rejection rate and an energy-efficient design.

products.name: Water Softener Plant(700 Ltr Resin Cap)
products.description: High-performance Water Softener Plant designed to remove hardness from water, ensuring scale-free plumbing, efficient appliances, and pure water.
products.detailedDescription: A Water Softener Plant is an advanced water treatment system designed to remove hardness-causing minerals like calcium and magnesium from water using ion exchange technology. Hard water creates scaling in pipelines, boilers, and appliances, reducing efficiency. Our Water Softener Plant ensures 100% soft water, protection against scaling, and longer life of pipelines and appliances.

products.name: Cooling Tower Fills Media
products.description: High-quality Cooling Tower Fills Media in PVC & PP. Designed for crossflow & counterflow towers to maximize cooling efficiency, durability, and performance.
products.detailedDescription: Cooling Tower Fills Media is a crucial component designed to improve the efficiency and performance of cooling towers by maximizing the surface area for heat transfer between air and water. Manufactured from premium quality PVC and PP materials, our fill media ensures high durability, chemical resistance, and long service life while reducing scaling and fouling. Available in different configurations such as film fills, splash fills, and drift eliminators, they are suitable for both crossflow and counterflow cooling towers used in HVAC systems, power plants, industrial cooling processes, petrochemical plants, and water treatment facilities. Easy to install, maintain, and cost-effective, our Cooling Tower Fill Media enhances cooling efficiency, reduces energy consumption, and ensures reliable long-term operation for a wide range of applications.

products.name: Cooling Tower Drift Eliminator
products.description: High-performance Cooling Tower Drift Eliminators designed to minimize water loss, prevent droplet carryover, and improve cooling tower efficiency.
products.detailedDescription: Cooling Tower Drift Eliminators are essential components designed to reduce water losses and control drift emissions in cooling towers by capturing and removing water droplets from the exhaust air stream. Manufactured from high-quality PVC and PP materials, our drift eliminators provide excellent durability, resistance to UV, corrosion, and chemicals, while ensuring long service life. They significantly improve cooling tower efficiency by preventing water wastage, reducing scaling and deposits, and maintaining compliance with environmental regulations.  Suitable for both counterflow and crossflow cooling towers in HVAC, power generation, industrial process cooling, and water treatment applications, our Cooling Tower Drift Eliminators are easy to install, lightweight, low maintenance, and cost-effective for long-term operation.
tags: cooling tower drift eliminator in Punjab
Cooling tower drift eliminator in Delhi

products.name: Bio Pack Media
products.description: High-quality Bio Pack Media for STP, ETP, and MBBR systems. Designed for maximum surface area, efficient biological growth, and long-term wastewater treatment performance.
products.detailedDescription: Bio Pack Media, also known as MBBR Media or FAB Media, is a crucial component used in sewage treatment plants (STP), effluent treatment plants (ETP), and biological wastewater treatment systems. Manufactured from durable virgin polypropylene (PP) with high surface area and structured design, our Bio Pack Media ensures excellent bacterial growth, faster decomposition of organic matter, and higher treatment efficiency. It is lightweight, non-clogging, easy to install, resistant to chemicals, and provides a long service life.  Widely used in MBBR reactors, aerobic and anaerobic systems, aquaculture, and wastewater recycling plants, our Bio Pack Media reduces BOD, COD, and suspended solids while delivering cost-effective and reliable performance for sustainable water treatment.

applications: food and beverage industry treatment plants

products.name: Tube Deck Media
products.description: High-quality Tube Deck Media (Tube Settler Media) for efficient sedimentation and clarification in STP, ETP, and water treatment plants. Durable, lightweight, and easy to install.
products.detailedDescription: Tube Deck Media, also known as Tube Settler Media or Lamella Clarifier Media, is a vital component used in sewage treatment plants (STP), effluent treatment plants (ETP), and water treatment systems to enhance sedimentation and clarification efficiency. Manufactured from high-strength PVC and PP materials, our Tube Deck Media is designed with a unique honeycomb/hexagonal structure that increases the settling surface.
tags: tube settler media manufacturer in Delhi

products.name: Coal Based Activated Carbon
products.description: High-quality Coal Based Granular Activated Carbon (GAC) for water and air purification. Delivers excellent adsorption, durability, and long-term performance.
products.detailedDescription: Granular Activated Carbon (GAC) – Coal Based is a highly effective adsorbent manufactured from premium-grade bituminous coal and processed through advanced activation technology to create a porous structure with a large surface area. It is widely used for the removal of chlorine, organic contaminants, VOCs, odors, pesticides, heavy metals, and other harmful pollutants from water, air, and industrial process streams. With high mechanical strength, low ash content, excellent adsorption capacity, and regenerable properties, Coal Based Granular Activated Carbon provides long service life and cost-effective purification. It is extensively applied in drinking water purification, wastewater treatment, air filtration, gold recovery, food and beverage processing, chemical and pharmaceutical industries, and municipal as well as industrial treatment plants for reliable and efficient contaminant removal.
tags: activated carbon for wast water treatment

products.name: Pelletized Activated Carbon
products.description: High-quality Pelletized Activated Carbon for water, air, and industrial purification. Offers high adsorption capacity, durability, and efficient contaminant removal.
products.detailedDescription: Pelletized Activated Carbon (PAC) is a premium-grade adsorbent manufactured from coal, coconut shell, or wood-based raw materials and processed into cylindrical pellets with high mechanical strength. Its uniform size, large surface area, and low dust content make it highly effective for removing contaminants such as chlorine, VOCs, odors, toxic gases, heavy metals, and organic pollutants. Pelletized Activated Carbon provides superior adsorption performance, low-pressure drop, and long service life, making it ideal for air purification, water treatment, solvent recovery, gas separation, gold recovery, and industrial effluent treatment. With high durability, thermal stability, and reactivation ability, PAC is a cost-effective solution for sustainable environmental and industrial purification processes.

applications: pelletized activated carbon for gas treatment
activated carbon pallet for pharmaceutical industries
activated carbon for municipal water purification

tags: Activated carbon carbon pallets manufaturer in india

products.name: PP Spun Filter Cartridge (10 Inch)
products.description: High-quality PP Spun Filter Cartridge for water purification and industrial filtration. Provides excellent sediment removal, high dirt holding capacity, and long service life.
products.detailedDescription: PP Spun Filter Cartridge, also known as Melt Blown Filter Cartridge, is made from 100% pure polypropylene using advanced melt-blown technology to provide a graded density structure for superior depth filtration. It efficiently removes sediments, rust, dirt, suspended particles, and other fine impurities from water and liquids while offering high dirt holding capacity, low-pressure drop, and consistent flow rate.

products.name: Zeosafe Media
products.description: Advanced sediment filter media from Europe for superior water purification. Offers better filtrate clarity, increased flow rates, and a long media bed life of 5-10 years.
products.detailedDescription: Zeosafe is a high-performance, naturally green sediment filter media made in Europe, designed for superior purification of drinking water, groundwater, surface water, and more. Its key benefits include better filtrate clarity, increased flow rates in both gravity and pressure systems, reduced backwash water usage, simpler handling, and better cleaning. With a long media bed life of 5-10 years and high capacity filtration, Zeosafe is an efficient and sustainable choice for various water treatment applications, including reverse osmosis pre-filtration and swimming pools.

products.name: Glass Filter Media (4x8)
products.description: High-performance crushed glass filter media, an eco-friendly alternative to silica sand. Provides finer filtration, longer life, and requires less backwashing.
products.detailedDescription: Our Glass Filter Media is an environmentally friendly and highly effective alternative to traditional sand for water filtration systems. Made from 100% recycled crushed glass, it provides superior water clarity by removing finer particles. The angular shape of the glass particles prevents channeling and ensures a more efficient filtration process. It is less prone to bio-fouling, requires less backwashing (saving water and energy), and has a longer lifespan than sand, making it a cost-effective and sustainable choice for swimming pools, industrial water treatment, and potable water applications.
